high_descs: Pick up the pen to the right of the alarm clock.
Take a step backwards from where you are at.
Open the bottom drawer and place the pen in it.
anns.task_desc: Place the pen next to the alarm clock in the bottom drawer of the desk.

high_descs: walk to the desk at front
grab the pen on the desk
open the bottom drawer, put the pen in the drawer, close the drawer
anns.task_desc: move the pen on the desk to the bottom drawer

high_descs: Go forward and face the top shelf of the desk.
Pick the pen up from the desk.
Turn around and face the drawers on the left side of the desk.
Put the pen in the bottom drawer on the left and shut the drawer.
anns.task_desc: Put a pen in a drawer.
